resources.string: Collects call and sms logs. Only the call and sms length are recorded, not their contents. Phone numbers are completely anonymised so they cannot be traced or linked to other people.
Location is used for estimating distance travelled. Only relative locations are gathered, the actual location is not stored.
Counts the number of contacts stored on your phone. No information about the contacts themselves are gathered.
Assess the number of Bluetooth devices that are within range or connected. No connections are made. Data is only collected if Bluetooth is turned on.
Phone sensors like acceleration and step counts.
Phone usage measures what apps are used and how long the phone is turned on.
